short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UNO Online lets you play the popular Uno card game for free in your chrome browser. Created for UNO game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to Play UNO Online

You may use a variety of tactics to increase your chances of succeeding in this Uno game for groups of players. The key idea is to discard all of your cards before anybody else.
